name: 100 Floors (DarkLightStudios)
description:
this is a single life dungeon crawler where you must reach the bottom of the 100 floor cavern, each time you play  will be completely different as you play a new person each time as well as the levels are procedural generated so it will look different each time.

during play click on the question mark if confused

use arrow keys to move

you the arrows on the UI to shoot 

when you have skill points use them to increase your skills.

click on the weapon in the middle of the arrow to change  weapon 

weapon damage is based on dex/int

rocks can be destroyed by the staff.
